/contracts/Affiliate/AffiliateProgram.so.devdoc: {"methods":{"credit(address,uint256)":{"details":"credit accepts eth and credits the affiliate's balance for the amount","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate to credit","_purchaseId":"- the purchaseId of the sale"}},"cutFor(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"cutFor returns the cut (amount in wei) to give in comission to the affiliate","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate to check for","_productId":"- the productId in the sale","_purchaseAmount":"- the purchaseAmount","_purchaseId":"- the purchaseId in the sale"}},"pause()":{"details":"called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state"},"rateFor(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"rateFor returns the rate which should be used to calculate the comission for this affiliate/sale combination, in basis points (1/100th of a percent).   *  We may want to completely blacklist a particular address (e.g. a known bad actor affilite). To that end, if the whitelistRate is exactly 1bp, we use that as a signal for blacklisting and return a rate of zero. The upside is that we can completely turn off sending transactions to a particular address when this is needed. The downside is that you can't issued 1/100th of a percent commission. However, since this is such a small amount its an acceptable tradeoff.   *  This implementation does not use the _productId, _pruchaseId, _purchaseAmount, but we include them here as part of the protocol, because they could be useful in more advanced affiliate programs.","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate to check for"}},"retire(address)":{"details":"retire - withdraws the entire balance and marks the contract as retired, which prevents unpausing.   * If no new comissions have been deposited for the alotted time, then the owner may pause the program and retire this contract. This may only be performed once as the contract cannot be unpaused.   * We do this as an alternative to selfdestruct, because certain operations can still be performed after the contract has been selfdestructed, such as the owner withdrawing ETH accidentally sent here."},"setBaselineRate(uint256)":{"details":"setBaselineRate - sets the baseline rate for any affiliate that is not whitelisted","params":{"_newRate":"- the rate, in bp (1/100th of a percent) to give any non-whitelisted affiliate. Set to zero to \"turn off\""}},"setMaximumRate(uint256)":{"details":"setMaximumRate - Set the maximum rate for any affiliate, including whitelists. That is, this overrides individual rates.","params":{"_newRate":"- the rate, in bp (1/100th of a percent)"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"_newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"unpause()":{"details":"called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state. Will not unpause if the contract is retired."},"whitelist(address,uint256)":{"details":"whitelist - white listed affiliates can receive a different  rate than the general public (whitelisted accounts would generally get a  better rate).","params":{"_affiliate":"- the affiliate address to whitelist","_rate":"- the rate, in basis-points (1/100th of a percent) to give this affiliate in each sale. NOTE: a rate of exactly 1 is the signal to blacklist this affiliate. That is, a rate of 1 will set the commission to 0."}},"withdraw()":{"details":"withdraw the msg.sender's balance"},"withdrawFrom(address,address)":{"details":"withdrawFrom allows the owner to withdraw an affiliate's unclaimed ETH, after the alotted time.   * This function can be called even if the contract is paused","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address of the affiliate","_to":"- the address to send ETH to"}}},"title":"AffiliateProrgam"}
/contracts/Affiliate/AffiliateProgram.so.userdoc: {"methods":{"credit(address,uint256)":{"notice":"credit an affiliate for a purchase"},"cutFor(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"cutFor returns the affiliate cut for a sale"},"isAffiliateProgram()":{"notice":"Exposes that this contract thinks it is an AffiliateProgram"},"rateFor(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"returns the commission rate for a sale"},"retire(address)":{"notice":"retire the contract (dangerous)"},"setBaselineRate(uint256)":{"notice":"set the rate for non-whitelisted affiliates"},"setMaximumRate(uint256)":{"notice":"set the maximum rate for any affiliate"},"unpause()":{"notice":"unpause the contract"},"whitelist(address,uint256)":{"notice":"whitelist an affiliate address"},"withdraw()":{"notice":"withdraw"},"withdrawFrom(address,address)":{"notice":"withdraw from a specific account"}}}

/contracts/LicenseAccessControl.sol:Lice.devdoc: {"methods":{"setCEO(address)":{"params":{"_newCEO":"- the address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"params":{"_newCFO":"- the address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"params":{"_newCOO":"- the address of the new COO"}},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"params":{"_newWithdrawalAddress":"- the address where we'll send the funds"}},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet."}},"title":"LicenseAccessControl"}
/contracts/LicenseAccessControl.sol:Lice.userdoc: {"methods":{"pause()":{"notice":"called by any C-level to pause, triggers stopped state"},"setCEO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CEO"},"setCFO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CFO"},"setCOO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new COO"},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new withdrawalAddress"},"unpause()":{"notice":"called by the CEO to unpause, returns to normal state"},"withdrawBalance()":{"notice":"Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress"}}}

/contracts/LicenseBase.sol:LicenseBase.devdoc: {"methods":{"licenseAffiliate(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseExpirationTime(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"setCEO(address)":{"params":{"_newCEO":"- the address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"params":{"_newCFO":"- the address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"params":{"_newCOO":"- the address of the new COO"}},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"params":{"_newWithdrawalAddress":"- the address where we'll send the funds"}},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet."}},"title":"LicenseBase"}
/contracts/LicenseBase.sol:LicenseBase.userdoc: {"methods":{"licenseAffiliate(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a the affiliate credited for the sale of this license"},"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's attributes"},"licenseExpirationTime(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's issueTime"},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's info"},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's issueTime"},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's productId"},"pause()":{"notice":"called by any C-level to pause, triggers stopped state"},"setCEO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CEO"},"setCFO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CFO"},"setCOO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new COO"},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new withdrawalAddress"},"unpause()":{"notice":"called by the CEO to unpause, returns to normal state"},"withdrawBalance()":{"notice":"Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress"}}}

/contracts/LicenseCore.sol:LicenseCore.devdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_to":"address to be approved for the given token ID","_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to be approved"}},"approveAll(address)":{"params":{"_to":"address to be approved for the given token ID"}},"availableInventoryOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"params":{"_owner":"address to query the balance of"},"return":"uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address"},"clearInventory(uint256)":{"details":"decrementInventory verifies inventory levels, whereas this method simply sets the inventory to zero. This is useful, for example, if an executive wants to take a product off the market quickly. There could be a race condition with decrementInventory where a product is sold, which could cause the admins decrement to fail (because it may try to decrement more than available).","params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"costForProductCycles(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"If a product is a subscription, the interval defines the period of time, in seconds, users can subscribe for. E.g. 1 month or 1 year. _numCycles is the number of these intervals we want to use in the calculation of the price.   * We require that the end user send precisely the amount required (instead of dealing with excess refunds). This method is public so that clients can read the exact amount our contract expects to receive.","params":{"_numCycles":"- the number of cycles to calculate for","_productId":"- the product we're calculating for"}},"createProduct(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_initialInventoryQuantity":"- the initial inventory (inventory can be changed)","_initialPrice":"- the starting price (price can be changed)","_productId":"- the id of the product to use (cannot be changed)","_supply":"- the total supply - use `0` for \"unlimited\" (cannot be changed)"}},"decrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_inventoryAdjustment":"- the amount to decrement","_productId":"- the product id"}},"disapproveAll(address)":{"details":"Note that this only removes the operator approval and does not clear any independent, specific approvals of token transfers to this address","params":{"_to":"address to be disapproved for the given token ID"}},"getApproved(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to query the approval of"},"return":"address currently approved to take ownership of the given token ID"},"incrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_inventoryAdjustment":"- the amount to increment","_productId":"- the product id"}},"intervalOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"params":{"_operator":"operator address which you want to query the approval of","_owner":"owner address which you want to query the approval of"},"return":"bool whether the given operator is approved by the given owner"},"isSubscriptionProduct(uint256)":{"details":"Some products are subscriptions and others are not. An interval of 0 means the product is not a subscription","params":{"_productId":"- the product we're checking"}},"licenseAffiliate(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseExpirationTime(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to query the owner of"},"return":"owner address currently marked as the owner of the given token ID"},"priceOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"productInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"purchase(uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Requires that the value sent is exactly the price of the product","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address to of the affiliate - use address(0) if none","_assignee":"- the address to assign the purchase to (doesn't have to be msg.sender)","_numCycles":"- the number of cycles being purchased. This number should be `1` for non-subscription products and the number of cycles for subscriptions.","_productId":"- the product to purchase"}},"renewableOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current owner, an authorized operator, or the approved address for this NFT. Throws if `_from` is not the current owner. Throws if `_to` is the zero address. Throws if `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT. When transfer is complete, this function checks if `_to` is a smart contract (code size > 0). If so, it calls `onERC721Received` on `_to` and throws if the return value is not `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC721Received(address,uint256,bytes)\"))`.","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`","_from":"The current owner of the NFT","_to":"The new owner","_tokenId":"The NFT to transfer"}},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"Emits the ApprovalForAll event","params":{"_approved":"True if the operators is approved, false to revoke approval","_to":"Address to add to the set of authorized operators."}},"setCEO(address)":{"params":{"_newCEO":"- the address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"params":{"_newCFO":"- the address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"params":{"_newCOO":"- the address of the new COO"}},"setPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_price":"- the product price","_productId":"- the product id"}},"setRenewable(uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_newRenewable":"- the new renewable setting","_productId":"- the product id"}},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"params":{"_newWithdrawalAddress":"- the address where we'll send the funds"}},"takeOwnership(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token being claimed by the msg.sender"}},"tokenByIndex(uint256)":{"details":"Our Licenses are kept in an array and each new License-token is just the next element in the array. This method is required for ERC721Enumerable which may support more complicated storage schemes. However, in our case the _index is the tokenId","params":{"_index":"A counter less than `totalSupply()`"},"return":"The token identifier for the `_index`th NFT"},"tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"Throws if `_index` >= `balanceOf(_owner)` or if `_owner` is the zero address, representing invalid NFTs.","params":{"_index":"A counter less than `balanceOf(_owner)`","_owner":"An address where we are interested in NFTs owned by them"},"return":"The token identifier for the `_index`th NFT assigned to `_owner`,"},"tokensOf(address)":{"params":{"_owner":"address to query the tokens of"},"return":"uint256[] representing the list of tokens owned by the passed address"},"totalSold(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"totalSupply()":{"return":"uint256 representing the total amount of tokens"},"totalSupplyOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_to":"address to receive the ownership of the given token ID","_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to be transferred"}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_from":"The address that owns the token","_to":"The address that will take ownership of the token. Can be any address, including the caller","_tokenId":"The ID of the token to be transferred"}},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet."}},"title":"LicenseCore is the entry point of the contract"}
/contracts/LicenseCore.sol:LicenseCore.userdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Approves another address to claim for the ownership of the given token ID"},"approveAll(address)":{"notice":"Approves another address to claim for the ownership of any tokens owned by this account"},"availableInventoryOf(uint256)":{"notice":"The available inventory of a product"},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Gets the balance of the specified address"},"clearInventory(uint256)":{"notice":"clearInventory clears the inventory of a product."},"costForProductCycles(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"returns the total cost to renew a product for a number of cycles"},"createProduct(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"createProduct creates a new product in the system"},"decrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"decrementInventory removes inventory levels for a product"},"disapproveAll(address)":{"notice":"Removes approval for another address to claim for the ownership of any tokens owned by this account."},"getAllProductIds()":{"notice":"Get all product ids"},"getApproved(uint256)":{"notice":"Gets the approved address to take ownership of a given token ID"},"incrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"incrementInventory - increments the inventory of a product"},"intervalOf(uint256)":{"notice":"The renewal interval of a product in seconds"},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"notice":"Tells whether an operator is approved by a given owner"},"isSubscriptionProduct(uint256)":{"notice":"returns if this product is a subscription or not"},"licenseAffiliate(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a the affiliate credited for the sale of this license"},"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's attributes"},"licenseExpirationTime(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's issueTime"},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's info"},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's issueTime"},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a license's productId"},"name()":{"notice":"token's name"},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"notice":"Gets the owner of the specified token ID"},"pause()":{"notice":"called by any C-level to pause, triggers stopped state"},"priceOf(uint256)":{"notice":"The price of a product"},"productInfo(uint256)":{"notice":"The product info for a product"},"purchase(uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"Makes a purchase of a product."},"renew(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Renews a subscription"},"renewableOf(uint256)":{"notice":"Is this product renewable?"},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Transfers the ownership of an NFT from one address to another address"},"setAffiliateProgramAddress(address)":{"notice":"executives *"},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"notice":"Enable or disable approval for a third party (\"operator\") to manage all your assets"},"setCEO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CEO"},"setCFO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new CFO"},"setCOO(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new COO"},"setPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"setPrice - sets the price of a product"},"setRenewable(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"setRenewable - sets if a product is renewable"},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new withdrawalAddress"},"symbol()":{"notice":"symbols's name"},"takeOwnership(uint256)":{"notice":"Claims the ownership of a given token ID"},"tokenByIndex(uint256)":{"notice":"Enumerate valid NFTs"},"tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Enumerate NFTs assigned to an owner"},"tokensOf(address)":{"notice":"Gets the list of tokens owned by a given address"},"totalSold(uint256)":{"notice":"The total sold of a product"},"totalSupply()":{"notice":"Gets the total amount of tokens stored by the contract"},"totalSupplyOf(uint256)":{"notice":"The total supply of a product"},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfers the ownership of a given token ID to another address"},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer a token owned by another address, for which the calling address has previously been granted transfer approval by the owner."},"withdrawBalance()":{"notice":"Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress"}}}

Throws if `_from` is not the current owner. Throws if `_to` is the zero address. Throws if `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT. When transfer is complete, this function checks if `_to` is a smart contract (code size > 0). If so, it calls `onERC721Received` on `_to` and throws if the return value is not `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC721Received(address,uint256,bytes)\"))`.","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`","_from":"The current owner of the NFT","_to":"The new owner","_tokenId":"The NFT to transfer"}},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"Emits the ApprovalForAll event","params":{"_approved":"True if the operators is approved, false to revoke approval","_to":"Address to add to the set of authorized operators."}},"setCEO(address)":{"params":{"_newCEO":"- the address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"params":{"_newCFO":"- the address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"params":{"_newCOO":"- the address of the new COO"}},"setPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_price":"- the product price","_productId":"- the product id"}},"setRenewable(uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_newRenewable":"- the new renewable setting","_productId":"- the product id"}},"setWithdrawalAddress(address)":{"params":{"_newWithdrawalAddress":"- the address where we'll send the funds"}},"takeOwnership(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token being claimed by the msg.sender"}},"tokenByIndex(uint256)":{"details":"Our Licenses are kept in an array and each new License-token is just the next element in the array. This method is required for ERC721Enumerable which may support more complicated storage schemes. However, in our case the _index is the tokenId","params":{"_index":"A counter less than `totalSupply()`"},"return":"The token identifier for the `_index`th NFT"},"tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"Throws if `_index` >= `balanceOf(_owner)` or if `_owner` is the zero address, representing invalid NFTs.","params":{"_index":"A counter less than `balanceOf(_owner)`","_owner":"An address where we are interested in NFTs owned by them"},"return":"The token identifier for the `_index`th NFT assigned to `_owner`,"},"tokensOf(address)":{"params":{"_owner":"address to query the tokens of"},"return":"uint256[] representing the list of tokens owned by the passed address"},"totalSold(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"totalSupply()":{"return":"uint256 representing the total amount of tokens"},"totalSupplyOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_to":"address to receive the ownership of the given token ID","_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to be transferred"}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_from":"The address that owns the token","_to":"The address that will take ownership of the token. Can be any address, including the caller","_tokenId":"The ID of the token to be transferred"}},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet."}}}

/contracts/LicenseSale.sol:LicenseSale.devdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_to":"address to be approved for the given token ID","_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to be approved"}},"approveAll(address)":{"params":{"_to":"address to be approved for the given token ID"}},"availableInventoryOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"params":{"_owner":"address to query the balance of"},"return":"uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address"},"clearInventory(uint256)":{"details":"decrementInventory verifies inventory levels, whereas this method simply sets the inventory to zero. This is useful, for example, if an executive wants to take a product off the market quickly. There could be a race condition with decrementInventory where a product is sold, which could cause the admins decrement to fail (because it may try to decrement more than available).","params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"costForProductCycles(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"If a product is a subscription, the interval defines the period of time, in seconds, users can subscribe for. E.g. 1 month or 1 year. _numCycles is the number of these intervals we want to use in the calculation of the price.   * We require that the end user send precisely the amount required (instead of dealing with excess refunds). This method is public so that clients can read the exact amount our contract expects to receive.","params":{"_numCycles":"- the number of cycles to calculate for","_productId":"- the product we're calculating for"}},"createProduct(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_initialInventoryQuantity":"- the initial inventory (inventory can be changed)","_initialPrice":"- the starting price (price can be changed)","_productId":"- the id of the product to use (cannot be changed)","_supply":"- the total supply - use `0` for \"unlimited\" (cannot be changed)"}},"decrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_inventoryAdjustment":"- the amount to decrement","_productId":"- the product id"}},"disapproveAll(address)":{"details":"Note that this only removes the operator approval and does not clear any independent, specific approvals of token transfers to this address","params":{"_to":"address to be disapproved for the given token ID"}},"getApproved(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to query the approval of"},"return":"address currently approved to take ownership of the given token ID"},"incrementInventory(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_inventoryAdjustment":"- the amount to increment","_productId":"- the product id"}},"intervalOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"params":{"_operator":"operator address which you want to query the approval of","_owner":"owner address which you want to query the approval of"},"return":"bool whether the given operator is approved by the given owner"},"isSubscriptionProduct(uint256)":{"details":"Some products are subscriptions and others are not. An interval of 0 means the product is not a subscription","params":{"_productId":"- the product we're checking"}},"licenseAffiliate(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseAttributes(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseExpirationTime(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseIssuedTime(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"licenseProductId(uint256)":{"params":{"_licenseId":"the license id"}},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"uint256 ID of the token to query the owner of"},"return":"owner address currently marked as the owner of the given token ID"},"priceOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"productInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"purchase(uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Requires that the value sent is exactly the price of the product","params":{"_affiliate":"- the address to of the affiliate - use address(0) if none","_assignee":"- the address to assign the purchase to (doesn't have to be msg.sender)","_numCycles":"- the number of cycles being purchased. This number should be `1` for non-subscription products and the number of cycles for subscriptions.","_productId":"- the product to purchase"}},"renewableOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_productId":"- the product id"}},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current owner, an authorized operator, or the approved address for this NFT. When transfer is complete, this function checks if `_to` is a smart contract (code size > 0). /contracts/interfaces/ERC721TokenReceive.devdoc: {"methods":{"onERC721Received(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"The ERC721 smart contract calls this function on the recipient  after a `transfer`. This function MAY throw to revert and reject the  transfer. This function MUST use 50,000 gas or less. Return of other  than the magic value MUST result in the transaction being reverted.  Note: the contract address is always the message sender.","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format","_from":"The sending address","_tokenId":"The NFT identifier which is being transfered"},"return":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC721Received(address,uint256,bytes)\"))`  unless throwing"}}}
